樴字的基本解释

樴
zhí
小木桩：“妇入门，先拜猪樴及灶。”
量词，相当于“枚”。

樴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhí］
［《廣韻》之翼切，入職，章。］
［《廣韻》徒得切，入德，定。］
“職2”的被通假字。
木桩。

樴字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　樴； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页551第21
【唐韻】之翼切【集韻】【韻會】質力切，?音職。【說文】杙也。【爾雅·釋宮】樴謂之杙。【郭註】橜也。　又【玉篇】繫牛杙。【周禮·肆師】大祭祀，展犧牲，繫于牢，頒于職人。【鄭註】職，讀作樴。【疏】謂牽牲于臬，置臬之時樴樴然作聲，故讀从樴。　又【集韻】敵得切，音特。義同。　又【集韻】逸織切，音弋。【說文】劉杙，或作樴。

考證：〔【周禮·春官】大祭祀，展犧牲，繫于牽，頒于職。〕　謹照原文春官改肆師。牽改牢。職下增人字。
樴字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
樴字的起名意思

暂无。

stake
Basic explanation of words
stake
zhí
Small wooden stake: "Women's introduction, first worship the pig and the stove."
The quantifier is equivalent to "Mei".
stake
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhí］
["Guangyun" wing cut, entry, chapter. ]
["Guangyun" learns to cut, enters into virtue, and settles. ]
The false word for "job 2" is passed.
Wooden stakes.
stake
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　樴; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 551 21
[Tang Yun] Wing Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Quality cut, sound job. [Said the text] Yeah. 【Erya·Shigong】It is said that it is 杙. [Guo Note] Ye Ye.　[Jade articles] is Niu Yao. [Zhou Li·Sishi] Great sacrifices, sacrifices, tied to prison, and awarded to clerks. [Zheng's Note] Position, pronounced as 樴. [Sparse] It is said that the animal is brought to the sham, and when the shovel is placed, the 樴樴 will make a sound, so it is read from Cong 樴.　[Jiyun] The enemy is cut, Yinte. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Yizhi cut, sound. [Speaking text] Liu Yao, or Zuo Yu. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Chunguan] Great sacrifice, sacrifice, tied to the lead, and awarded to the post. 〔〕 　 I would like to change the official official title to Si division according to the original text. Keep it tight. Add a character under the post.
